title: Fondue for Two
description: Fondue for Two (and its spinoff Queso por Dos) combines two things Brittany likes most: hot cheese and talking to people.
quote: Lord Tubbington is allowed to eat cheese because he’s on Atkins.
altHero: Brittany S. Pierce in her room
alt1: Brittany eating fondue in her bedroom with Mercedes Jones and Tina Cohen-Chang
alt2: Brittany chats with her cat Lord Tubbington
alt3: Brittany welcomes Rachel Berry and Mercedes Jones
alt4: Brittany has fondue with Santana Lopez’s abuela
